mutants.code:
import re

def isPalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s).lower()
    return s != s[::-1]

import re

def isPalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('', '', s).lower()
    return s == s[::-1]

import re

def isPalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', 'MUTATED', s).lower()
    return s == s[::-1]

import re

def isPalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s).lower()
    return s == s[::+1]

import re

def isPalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s).lower()
    return s == s[::-2]

import re

def isPalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s).lower()
    return s == s[::-0]

import re

def isPalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s).lower()
    return s == s[::-0]

import re

def isPalindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s).lower()
    return s == s[::--1]
